Method Detail

Same_Move_P

public boolean Same_Move_P(commonMove oth)
This is used to check for equivalent moves "as specified" not "as executed", so it should only compare those elements that are specified when the move is created.

Specified by:
Same_Move_P in class commonMove
Returns:
true if these moves are the same move

public commonMove Copy(commonMove to)
Description copied from class: commonMove

Specified by:

Returns:
